wheelsFX.users.Shapes

Class RectangularShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • wheelsFX.users.Shapes.Shape
      • wheelsFX.users.Shapes.RectangularShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Rectangle, Triangle

    public abstract class RectangularShape
extends Shape
    Abstract class to represent a WheelsFX shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RectangularShape()
      No argument empty constructor
      RectangularShape(javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape)
      Constructor to take in a shape, the shape is assigned a default size and location
      RectangularShape(javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape, @NonNull javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Constructor to take in a shape and a color, the shape is assigned a default size and location
      RectangularShape(javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape, int x, int y)
      Constructor to take in a shape and location coordinates x and y, the shape is assigned a default size of 50x50
